DocAttribute.Name: LongitudinalStartPosition
DocAttribute.Documentation: The start position in longitudinal direction for the section reinforcement properties.

DocAttribute.Name: LongitudinalEndPosition
DocAttribute.Documentation: The end position in longitudinal direction for the section reinforcement properties.

DocAttribute.Name: TransversePosition
DocAttribute.Documentation: The position for the section reinforcement properties in transverse direction.

DocAttribute.Name: ReinforcementRole
DocAttribute.Documentation: The role, purpose or usage of the reinforcement, i.e. the kind of loads and stresses it is intended to carry, defined for the section reinforcement properties.

DocAttribute.Name: SectionDefinition
DocAttribute.Documentation: Definition of the cross section profile and longitudinal section type.

DocAttribute.Name: CrossSectionReinforcementDefinitions
DocAttribute.Documentation: The set of reinforcment properties attached to a section reinforcement properties definition.
